title: Reconciliation service
description:
Generate candidates, auto-merge >=0.90, queue others for review.

## Implementation
- `internal/service/reconciler.go` DetectAndQueue() method
- Stage 1: exact match (external_id, source_hash) -> auto-merge
- Stage 2: fuzzy match (amount, date window, description similarity)
- Stage 3: LLM judge for fuzzy candidates
- Auto-merge if LLM confidence >= 0.90
- Queue for user review if confidence < 0.90

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Exact matches auto-merge without user prompt
- [ ] Fuzzy candidates sent to LLM for judgment
- [ ] High-confidence (>=0.90) auto-merges
- [ ] Lower confidence queued for user review
- [ ] Merge keeps later/posted transaction
- [ ] Merge preserves user metadata from both
- [ ] Dropped transaction marked as 'reconciled' status
- [ ] Unit tests: exact, fuzzy, LLM paths
- [ ] Integration test: full detection cycle

comments.author: jask-aran
comments.text: DetectAndQueue currently enqueues all fuzzy matches even when LLM confidence is high; Stage3 auto-merge >=0.90 from SPEC.md not implemented. Need to apply auto-merge path and keep queue only for lower confidence.

title: Bug: Reconciliation auto-merge missing for high LLM confidence
description: DetectAndQueue currently enqueues all fuzzy matches even when LLM confidence is high. SPEC Stage3 requires auto-merging candidates when confidence >=0.90 with metadata carryover. Users expect auto-merge per docs.
acceptance_criteria: LLM >=0.90 auto-merges without manual review; lower confidence remains queued; merge preserves metadata per chooseKeep; tests cover high/low confidence paths and exact/fuzzy/LLM cases; docs/spec aligned with behavior.
